skills.name: analysis-agent
skills.description: Analytical agent focused on problem decomposition, causal reasoning, and evidence-based conclusions.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: code-agent
skills.description: Disciplined code-editing agent operating under incomplete visibility with strict correctness and minimal-change guarantees.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: code-review
skills.description: Structured code review workflow with priority-based classification, security focus, and actionable feedback
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: context-manager
skills.description: Context management operations for discovering, extracting, and maintaining project context. Used by Tachikoma to efficiently manage context without LLM token costs.
skills.author: tachikoma

skills.name: context7
skills.description: Retrieve live documentation for libraries and frameworks via Context7 API. Used by Tachikoma during research intent to get current docs instead of stale training data.
skills.author: tachikoma

skills.name: formatter
skills.description: Automated code quality cleanup - removes debug code, formats, optimizes imports, fixes linting, and validates types. Used by Tachikoma during the cleanup phase of implementation.
skills.author: tachikoma

skills.name: git-commit
skills.description: Expert at writing Git commit messages that are concise, clear, and follow conventional style.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: intent-classifier
skills.description: Classifies user queries into intents for the Tachikoma orchestrator. Returns structured classification with confidence scores.
skills.author: tachikoma

skills.name: model-aware-editor
skills.description: Model-specific edit format optimization. Selects optimal edit format per model to maximize success rates.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: pr
skills.description: Expert at writing pull request titles and descriptions that are clear, concise, and useful for future reference.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: prompt-engineer
skills.description: Comprehensive prompt engineering workflow with safety frameworks, bias mitigation, and responsible AI usage
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: reflection-orchestrator
skills.description: Explicit self-verification and reflection for reliable outputs. Implements adversarial self-correction methodology.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: research-agent
skills.description: Evidence-driven research agent operating under partial visibility with strict source evaluation and uncertainty labeling.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: rlm
skills.description: Run a Recursive Language Model-style loop for long-context tasks. Uses a persistent local Python REPL and an rlm-subcall subagent as the sub-LLM (llm_query).
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: security-audit
skills.description: OWASP-based security audit workflow for identifying vulnerabilities, applying mitigations, and ensuring code security
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: self-learning
skills.description: Meta-analysis and project context evolution skill. Reviews completed interactions to identify valid improvements to project knowledge and conventions, and proposes updates for approval.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: skill-composer
skills.description: Dynamically compose existing skills for novel tasks. Treats skills as modular components to synthesize new capabilities through intelligent sequencing and state passing.
skills.author: tachikoma

skills.name: task-tracking
skills.description: Three-file progressive tracking system (plan/details/changes) with MANDATORY updates and divergent-change logging for accountability.
skills.author: tachikoma

skills.name: verifier-code-agent
skills.description: Generator-Verifier-Reviser pattern for reliable code execution. Iteratively generates, verifies, and revises solutions for higher success rates.
skills.author: unknown

skills.name: workflow-management
skills.description: Production-grade 6-phase development workflow with quality gates, confidence-based adaptation, and automated technical debt tracking.
skills.author: tachikoma
